app.description: annotate a VCF with values from a bigwig file

option.name: TAG
option.description: Name of the INFO tag. default: name of the bigwig

option.name: contained
option.description: Specifies wig values must be contained by region. if false: return any intersecting region values

option.name: aggregateMethodStr
option.description: How to aggregate overlapping values: 'avg' average; 'median': median, 'first': use first, 'all' : print all the data
